projects.title: Star Wars Database!
projects.description: This is a program that allows a user to search their favorite character's information from the Star Wars Universe.  It pulls from the Star Wars API and displays this information on a Bootstrap Table. The Pagination allows the user to scroll through the data in blocks of 10 characters.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: This program is a simple expense tracker.  The user inputs the type, vendor, date, and amount of a purchase. The application will then display this data via a Bootstrap table. The user can also delete any expense.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A simple calculator application. This program allows for continuous operations of any two numbers. It allows for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
